rules_text:
Reborn 1–{2}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
When Cryptcrawler Duelist becomes reborn, draw a card.
notes:
2k17
Outlast—Discard a card > Reborn 1—2U
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on Cryptcrawler Duelist, you may draw a card. > When Cryptcrawler Duelist becomes reborn, draw a card.
